title: misc/emacs: gofmt in go-mode.el errors out when file doesn't end in newline
body:
by **jlisee**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Put this program in an emacs buffer (note the *lack of newline at the end*):
http://play.golang.org/p/5V3r-59Wy6
2. Run gofmt emacs command (M-x gofmt)
3. See error message

What is the expected output?

"Hunk applied" appears in the command buffer


What do you see instead?

"Try to auto-fix word wrap damage? (y or n)" appears in the command buffer,
answering y or n doesn't format the program.


Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

Default go distribution.

Which operating system are you using?

Ubuntu 10.04.4 LTS (Emacs 23.1.1)

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

go version go1.0.3

Please provide any additional information below.

See discussion on golang-nuts here:
https://groups.google.com/d/msg/golang-nuts/Xs3eFKYb180/UG1Gq53g7yYJ
